data.title: Artist: Lena Flohrschütz
data.meta_description: Lena Flohrschütz, born 1985, living in Leipzig, Germany ★ My work attempts to realize social psychological concerns and to sensitize our perception of contemporary propaganda-methods. It is situated in the field of radical constructivism within epistemology. Both multimedia-based space installations and „billboards“ are an essential part of my work. The billboards are visual hybrids of advertisements, protest banners and city debris. They present painterly approaches to generation-specifi...
data.text:
My work attempts to realize social psychological concerns and to sensitize our perception of contemporary propaganda-methods. It is situated in the field of radical constructivism within epistemology.

Both multimedia-based space installations and „billboards“ are an essential part of my work. The billboards are visual hybrids of advertisements, protest banners and city debris. They present painterly approaches to generation-specific and emotional land and actual cityscapes.

The terms and slogans in writing on the mirrors are propositions and trigger points for the viewer to start a search for traces in their own youth and the present.
